programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. How will he get down? Pigeonton get help! // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime but who is the litterbug?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club) S1 (19/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club»Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les avions en papier) S3 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant) S3 (51/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La plus grande flaque de boue du monde) S3 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Patata-Parc) S4 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Patata-Parc»Peppa and her family visit a new theme park: Potato City. There they discover that the magic of vegetables never ends. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (C'est un lézard !) S5 (n°17)
programme.desc: «C'est un lézard !»When showman Gil's "real live dragon" (actually a Komodo Dragon) gets loose in the small town of Bubbleville, it's up to Pet Finders Oona and Zooli to track the lizard down and return it to its home on Komodo Island.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le restaurant de Blue) S2 (6/21)
programme.desc: «Le restaurant de Blue»Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une berceuse pour Blue) S2 (9/21)
programme.desc: «Une berceuse pour Blue»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure»Enrique steals all the fruit in 'The Fruit Festival', then in 'Abuelo's Treasure', the crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure. (S2, ep 6).

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Curse of the Pirate Baby) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «The Curse of the Pirate Baby»Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires»The Show Must Flow On: When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. (S1, ep 7a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le shampoing volumateur / La machine à rétrécir) S4 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Le shampoing volumateur / La machine à rétrécir»The Kit-trastrophe crew get into the poufy shampoo and blow away. // Marshall dreams he gets shrunk.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le club nature) S2 (19/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le club nature»Paddington's Nature Club: Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? (S2, ep 19a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en bateau de Polly) S3 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en bateau de Polly»Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Delphine l'âne) S3 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Delphine l'âne»Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de pompier) S3 (13/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de pompier»When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Surprise) S1 (n°43)
programme.desc: «The Surprise»They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Paperplane Race) S1 (n°44)
programme.desc: «The Paperplane Race»Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La grande fête de Blue) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La grande fête de Blue»Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une chaleur écrasante / Alex l'apprenti fermier) S4 (15/26)
programme.desc: «Une chaleur écrasante / Alex l'apprenti fermier»It's hot in Adventure Bay and everyone wants ice cream. Unfortunately, everything is finished and the delivery is late. Captain Turbot and Francois compete against each other in a bag-jumping competition.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le singe de l'espace) S3 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Le singe de l'espace»Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique) S1 (10/20)
programme.desc: «La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique»Mr. Steel wants to go to the moon and orders Professor Sketch to turn the Steel Tower into a rocket! A magician lures the audience away from Rammy's presentation, who gets so angry that he takes it out on the man's hat.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity) S2 (9/20)
programme.desc: «Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity»Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade in 'Lady Monkey Mech', then in 'Critter Care Calamity', Pollen from Bobbi's snuffleblooms makes everyone start getting super sneezes!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek) S1 (27/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek»Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coach Mamie Shark / Programme chargé) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Coach Mamie Shark / Programme chargé»Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le défi du requin) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le défi du requin»Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hiccups) S1 (n°40)
programme.desc: «Hiccups»Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Give-Away Day) S1 (45/78)
programme.desc: «Give-Away Day»Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (3/78)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christopher) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Christopher»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Photo) S1 (5/78)
programme.desc: «The Photo»Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (6/78)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! (S1, ep 6).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Princesse Peppa) S3 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Princesse Peppa»Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Teddy Maternello) S3 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Teddy Maternello»Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des pirates de Danny) S3 (16/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des pirates de Danny»It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours d'animaux) S4 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours d'animaux»There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but finds it hard to choose the best pet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toile d'araignée) S4 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La toile d'araignée»Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are in Daddy Pig's study, and they see that it is a complete mess and full of spider webs. They see a spider, which Peppa names Mister Skinnylegs, but Mummy Pig is afraid and tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it. They set out to find a new home for Mister Skinnylegs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une nuit mouvementée) S4 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Une nuit mouvementée»Peppa's family are staying at Cousin Chloe's house. After a long day everyone is tired and wants to go to sleep. But baby Alexander's crying is keeping everyone awake!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism»Everyday fun with Barbapapa and his family ? a very special group of colourful creatures who can change into all shapes and sizes. Join in all the adventures and fun with this big happy family! This animated series is based on the successful series of children's books by Annette Tison and Talus Taylor. The first Barbapapa book was published in 1970 and has since been translated into over 30 languages.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Place à l'ambulance) S7 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Place à l'ambulance»When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les chevaliers en armure) S7 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Les chevaliers en armure»When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le grand singe / Le petit chat perché) S4 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Le grand singe / Le petit chat perché»After a visit to the jungle, a big hairy monkey hitchhike to Adventure Bay. A kitten from Mayor Humdinger flies off to play with baby eagles.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune) S2 (10/20)
programme.desc: «Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune»Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Il faut sauver les abeilles) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver les abeilles»All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. How will he get down? Pigeonton get help! // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime but who is the litterbug?

programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club»Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La plus grande flaque de boue du monde) S3 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.desc: «The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure»Enrique steals all the fruit in 'The Fruit Festival', then in 'Abuelo's Treasure', the crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure. (S2, ep 6).

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Curse of the Pirate Baby) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «The Curse of the Pirate Baby»Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires»The Show Must Flow On: When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. (S1, ep 7a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le shampoing volumateur / La machine à rétrécir) S4 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Le shampoing volumateur / La machine à rétrécir»The Kit-trastrophe crew get into the poufy shampoo and blow away. // Marshall dreams he gets shrunk.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le club nature) S2 (19/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le club nature»Paddington's Nature Club: Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? (S2, ep 19a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Goldie, le poisson rouge) S3 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Goldie, le poisson rouge»Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête foraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête foraine»The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les chiffres) S3 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Les chiffres»Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Maître Christophe) S1 (47/78)
programme.desc: «Maître Christophe»Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (An Endless Story) S1 (n°48)
programme.desc: «An Endless Story»Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête costumée de Blue) S1 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La fête costumée de Blue»Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le courrier du facteur / Le puits à souhaits) S4 (20/26)
programme.desc: «Le courrier du facteur / Le puits à souhaits»The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal»Candy floss clouds cause confusion in 'Every Cloud', and then in 'Rainbow Comet Rush', can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? (S2, ep 11).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector) S1 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector»It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau»Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza in 'Snowball Bonanza', and in 'The Present', Baby Shark goes undercover to get the perfect gift for Mummy Shark. (S1, ep 15).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Détective Baby Shark»Detective Baby Shark: When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Funny Sounds) S1 (46/78)
programme.desc: «Funny Sounds»Silly Sounds: When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. (S1, ep 46).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Amazing Guesser) S1 (51/78)
programme.desc: «The Amazing Guesser»The Amazing Guesser: After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! (S1, ep 51).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (7/78)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (8/78)
programme.desc: «The Nap»The Nap: Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep! (S1, ep 8).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (9/78)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! (S1, ep 10).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster) S3 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster»C'est l'anniversaire de Peppa. Tous ses amis sont invités à la fête. Papa Cochon s'apprête à faire un show extraordinaire pour l'occasion.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mer, soleil et neige) S3 (30/52)
programme.desc: «Mer, soleil et neige»La famille de Peppa organise une excursion à la mer afin de bâtir des châteaux de sable sur la plage, mais à leur arrivée, il y a de la neige...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Maman Pig donne son vieil ordinateur à Granny et Grandpa Pig, mais sauront-ils s'en servir ?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa et ses amis de la garderie accompagnent madame Gazelle à l'hôpital pour rendre une visite à Pedro, qui a une jambe cassée...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le puits à souhaits) S4 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Le puits à souhaits»Granny Pig places a large order of plastic gnomes and a wishing well for the garden, Peppa and George love them but Grandpa Pig is not happy. He wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»Madame Gazelle announces that she is leaving the playgroup. The children are very sad to lose their favourite teacher, so they decide to throw her a leaving party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»The Queen decided to give out an award for the hardest working person. She announces that the medal will go to Miss Rabbit. She is invited to the Queen's palace for a special ceremony. She takes her friends with her, including Peppa and George. After the ceremony is done they all go to the garden and Peppa shows the Queen just how fun muddy puddles are.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Big Bad Hen) S1 (45/52)
programme.desc: «The Big Bad Hen»The Big Bad Hen: Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard. (S1, ep 17b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les jeux du flocon) S7 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Les jeux du flocon»It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Place à l'ambulance) S7 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Place à l'ambulance»When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint) S4 (17/26)
programme.desc: «La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint»Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball) S2
programme.desc: «La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?
